Parameter.Name: Properties
Parameter.Value: <Data> <Columns> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/Model$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/Description$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/Location$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/PrimaryOwnerContact$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/PrimaryOwnerName$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/SNMPAddress$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="IUGN.UPS"]/Manufacturer$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="IUGN.UPS"]/Model$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="NetworkLibrary!System.NetworkManagement.Node"]/Vendor$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="IUGN.UPS"]/SoftwareVersion$</ID> </Column> <Column Visible ="True"> <ID>$MPElement[Name="IUGN.UPS"]/AgentSoftwareVersion$</ID> </Column> </Columns> </Data>

DisplayString.Name: UPS RFC 1628 Management Pack
DisplayString.Description: For UPS devices with support RFC 1628

DisplayString.Name: Open UPS web interface using 80 port
Open UPS web interface using 443 port
Battery Bad Monitor
DisplayString.Description: One or more batteries have been determined to require replacement

DisplayString.Name: Battery Bad Monitor
On Battery Monitor
Low Battery Monitor
Depleted Battery Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The UPS will be unable to sustain the present load when and if the utility power is lost.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Temp Bad Monitor
DisplayString.Description: A temperature is out of tolerance.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Input Bad Monitor
DisplayString.Description: An input condition is out of tolerance.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Output Bad Monitor Monitor
DisplayString.Description: An output condition (other than OutputOverload) is out of tolerance. SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Output Overload Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The output load exceeds the UPS output capacity.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: On Bypass Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The Bypass is presently engaged on the UPS.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Bypass Bad Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The Bypass is out of tolerance.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Output Off As Requested Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The UPS has shutdown as requested, i.e., the output is off.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Ups Off As Requested Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The entire UPS has shutdown as commanded.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Charger Failed Monitor
DisplayString.Description: An uncorrected problem has been detected within the UPS charger subsystem.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Ups Output Off Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The output of the UPS is in the off state.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Ups System Off Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The UPS system is in the off state.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Fan Failure Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The failure of one or more fans in the UPS has been detected.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Fuse Failure Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The failure of one or more fuses has been detected.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: General Fault Monitor
DisplayString.Description: A general fault in the UPS has been detected.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Diagnostic Test Failed Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The result of the last diagnostic test indicates a failure.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Communications Lost Monitor
DisplayString.Description: A problem has been encountered in the communications between the agent and the UPS.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Awaiting Power Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The UPS output is off and the UPS is awaiting the return of input power.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: Shutdown Pending Monitor
DisplayString.Description: A upsShutdownAfterDelay countdown is underway.SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: ShutdownImminent Monitor
DisplayString.Description: The UPS will turn off power to the load in less than 5 seconds; this may be either a timed shutdown or a low battery shutdown. SNMP Trap from {0}

DisplayString.Name: UPS General Information Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS General Information Report The report displays these discovered properties: Display Name, Model, Description, Location, Primary Owner Contact, Primary Owner Name, Serial Number, SNMP Address.

DisplayString.Name: UPS Input Frequency Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Input Frequency Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Input Voltage Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Input Voltage Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Input Current Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Input Current Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Input True Power Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Input True Power Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Output Percent Load Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Output Percent Load Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Output Voltage Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Output Voltage Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Output Current Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Output Current Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Output True Power Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Output True Power Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Bypass Voltage Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Bypass Voltage Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Bypass Current Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Bypass Current Report

DisplayString.Name: UPS Bypass True Power Report
DisplayString.Description: UPS Bypass True Power Report

DisplayString.Name: Input Line Frequency Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present input frequency

DisplayString.Name: Input Line Voltage Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present input Voltage

DisplayString.Name: Input Line Current Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present input Current

DisplayString.Name: Input Line True Power Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Input True Power

DisplayString.Name: Output Line Voltage Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Output Voltage

DisplayString.Name: Output Line Current Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Output Current

DisplayString.Name: Output Line True Power Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Output True Power

DisplayString.Name: Output Line Percent Load Rule
DisplayString.Description: The percentage of the UPS power capacity presently being used on this output line, i.e., the greater of the percent load of true power capacity and the percent load of VA.

DisplayString.Name: Bypass Line Voltage Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Bypass Voltage

DisplayString.Name: Bypass Line Current Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present Bypass Current

DisplayString.Name: Bypass Line True Power Rule
DisplayString.Description: The present true power conveyed by the bypass
